attributes.additional_details: I would like the Home Office to take action against Pakistani ex interior minister Zulfiqar Mirza and Lord Nazir and Lord Qurban, who are promoting support for Taliban and asking for thier assistance for justice, and giving them an open invitation to assist them against Pakistan, America and the UK. Zufiqar mirza is here in the UK and has backing from Lord Nazir and Lord Qurban and has openly said he will ask the Taliban to assit him and this was said in the meeting room of the House of Commons on the 18th November, this is the youtube link (http://www.youtube.com/watch?NR=1&v=pvy50blnY7s) where he has openly said he will go to the Taliban. Lord Nazir and Lord Qurban are from here and they know how serouis this matter is, but still did nothing. Please review this matter before it becomes trouble for us here and abroad, and action needs to be taken against people like these to stop promting terrorism in an open manner. And Mr Mirza's visa needs to be canceled.
